attributes.action: save our Roman Circus in Colchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Colchester, the Roman Capital of Britain, has the only Roman Circus in Britain and North of the Alpes! "In archeological terms it gets an A*************" said Philip Crummy from the Colchester Archaeological Trust.  

Everything needs to be done to preserve this location and to make it a destination for everyone to learn about our national history.  English Heritage made it into a Scheduled Ancient Monument, so the property developers who own the land cannot build on it.  However, the developers are looking for a buyer of the Sergeants' Mess plus garden (which includes the entrance to the Roman Circus).  This unique Roman site is part of our heritage and needs to be on show and secured for the Nation.
